item.title: Semantically cluster any Blue Sky thread
item.description: Like the treeverse app, but semantically instead of just looking at a tree. Then after that do it with Hacker News. This is a “bottom up” way to spread this interface.

item.title: Is culture splitting?
item.description: x.com/DefenderOfBasic/status/1878281206720090145 The memeome project is how we know, or remain tethered as a species.

item.title: How does a breakthrough reach the physicists?
item.description: Once you find a breakthrough, how DOES it spread in society? Woah. I gotta be honest, I was expecting some complete pseudoscience bs from this. Just finished a first read-through and I’m blown away, and think that the author should immediately work with “credentialed” physicists to get this into the scientific mainstream (Nature paper).
